articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Instacart CEO Fidji Simo is joining OpenAI - TechCrunch
articles.description: Simo, already a board member at OpenAI, will transition out of Instacart over the next few months and join the AI company full-time as Application CEO.
articles.content: Instacart CEO Fidji Simo is joining OpenAI as CEO of Applications, the ChatGPT maker said on Thursday. Simo, already a board member at OpenAI, will transition out of Instacart over the next few month… [+1751 chars]

articles.title: Matter update may finally take the tedium out of setting up your smart home - Ars Technica
articles.description: Matter is taking care of a few common smart home headaches.
